document_data.name: Nelaeryn Mornmist
document_data.mainbody: '''Nelaeryn Mornmist''' was an inhabitant of [[Myth Drannor]] in the 3{{rd}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: During the laying of the ''[[Mythal]]'', Nelaeryn Mornmist was using a scrying globe and reading papers, with his wife close by. He was one of the first to feel the effects of the ''mythal'', and suffered from backlash when [[Uldreiyn Starym]] attacked its creators while they were working. However, the mythal ultimately stabilized, and Nelaeryn was one of the first to use it in order to fly and dance in the air with his servants.
